item.title: 3 Misunderstandings about Credential Stuffing attacks
item.description: Another day, another report of a data breach. The description in Macy’s announcement, though, is noticeably different than most — there was no reference to internal systems being accessed beyond the web application and no data extracted en masse.

item.title: Life and Role Changes
item.description: After nearly 15 years as a Californian, it’s time for a change.

item.title: Out with wordpress, in with Hugo
item.description: Old blog posts are archived as static files here
